description: Deletes the resource-based permission policy that's attached to the secret.  Minimum permissions  To run this command, you must have the following permissions:   secretsmanager:DeleteResourcePolicy    Related operations    To attach a resource policy to a secret, use PutResourcePolicy.   To retrieve the current resource-based policy that's attached to a secret, use GetResourcePolicy.   To list all of the currently available secrets, use ListSecrets.
